main.description:
More and more schools and teachers are using Bookingflix. Especially the appointment with parents for parent-teacher conferences is very popular. Or also the appointment arrangement for the new registration of the children when changing schools.
Bookingflix has of course been developed in accordance with DSGVO standards.
main.title: Schools and educational institutions

sub.description:
Parents do not have to contact the classroom teacher by email or phone. There is also no need for silent mail, i.e. making appointments using the child as an appointment facilitator. The teacher creates an appointment booking calendar in a few minutes. We recommend the booking calendar for specific events. The event is, for example, a parent-teacher conference or a learning progress meeting with the parents or guardians. Several times can be set for this event. In this way, each parent can book their own preferred date and time. You can see directly which appointment is still free. The appointment confirmation can be sent immediately and automatically via the Bookingflix system. But also a manual entry is optionally possible at any time for the teacher.
If the parents want to change or cancel the appointment, this is also possible directly via Bookingflix. A lengthy, sometimes annoying appointment coordination is simply eliminated.
For every appointment booking calendar created, an appointment booking website is automatically created as well. So every teacher can share the link to his own appointment booking website with the parents. It is therefore not necessary to include it on the school's website. The appointment booking website can be customized and filled with additional information. Also the imprint and the data protection information can be easily inserted.
Bookingflix also offers a chat function. Over this the parents write with special requests to the teachers an email. The reverse way is of course also possible.
Data protection is guaranteed at all times. Sensitive data is usually not required. The name of the parents or the first name of the child is sufficient to make an appointment. The data is stored on servers within Germany. After 30 days, the appointment data is automatically deleted by the system (deletion periods). An earlier deletion or a backup of the data via an export is also possible.
A special service are the appointment reminders. By email or by SMS. Teachers:innen can set themselves whether and when an appointment reminder is sent by email or SMS. This increases the reliability of appointments.
The calendars can be managed centrally by one person. The teachers:innen get access to the complete administration or only limited access to the data or settings of the individual calendar. In this way, data protection is also ensured within the school and everyone is only shown what is really relevant.
